title: Introduction to Machine Learning
description: A comprehensive guide to machine learning fundamentals, covering supervised and unsupervised learning algorithms.

title: React Development Best Practices
description: Modern React patterns, hooks, performance optimization, and component architecture for scalable applications.

title: Database Design Principles
description: Relational database design, normalization, indexing strategies, and query optimization techniques.

title: Docker Container Orchestration
description: Container deployment, Kubernetes basics, microservices architecture, and DevOps best practices.

title: Python Data Analysis
description: Data manipulation with pandas, visualization with matplotlib, statistical analysis and data cleaning techniques.

title: API Security Guidelines
description: Authentication, authorization, rate limiting, input validation, and security best practices for REST APIs.

title: Neural Networks Fundamentals
description: Deep learning basics, backpropagation, neural network architectures, and training optimization.

title: Cloud Architecture Patterns
description: Scalable cloud solutions, serverless computing, microservices, and distributed system design patterns.

title: JavaScript Testing Strategies
description: Unit testing, integration testing, test-driven development, and automated testing frameworks for JavaScript.

title: Git Workflow Management
description: Version control strategies, branching models, code review processes, and collaborative development workflows.
